description:
python tools/install_venv.py fails as tools/pip-requires requires novaclient 2.5 which doesn't exist.

Downloading/unpacking python-novaclient==2.5 (from -r /nova-trunk/tools/pip-requires (line 13))
  Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement python-novaclient==2.5 (from -r /nova-trunk/tools/pip-requires (line 13)) (from versions: )
No distributions matching the version for python-novaclient==2.5 (from -r /nova-trunk/tools/pip-requires (line 13))
title: tools/pip-requires requires non-existing novaclient
